title: MeteoWear
summary: Complete weather forecasts, right on your wrist.

description: MeteoWear is an app designed specifically for Android Wearâ„¢ smartwatches that lets you view the current weather in your location and two other cities of your choice. Plus, get detailed hourly forecasts up to 48 hours from now and daily forecasts for the week ahead. Want to learn more about any given forecast? descriptionHTML:
MeteoWear is an app designed specifically for Android Wear™ smartwatches that lets you view the current weather in your location and two other cities of your choice. Plus, get detailed hourly forecasts up to 48 hours from now and daily forecasts for the week ahead. Want to learn more about any given forecast? One tap, and you'll be able to view information on wind (speed and direction), precipitation (probability and intensity), pressure, humidity, visibility, dew point, sunrise and sunset times, and moon phase. All on your watch.

Note: At this time, MeteoWear does not support updating the weather when your watch is not connected to your phone.

All weather information is provided by Dark Sky (darksky.net) and subject to availability by location.

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
comments: Got a smartwatch? GET THIS! This is extremely useful! I love how it tells you the weather for the week ahead and gives you updates if weather changes. Best of all, THIS IS FREE! Most developers charge money for this type of application. This dev is fantastic and it's a shame this only has >100 downloads (at the time of writing this). This needs to be preinstalled on every smartwatch because this is the most useful thing I've used yet. Did I mention that it's free? Because it's free!
Absolutely the best and most exact.. Absolutely the best and most exact weather app for wear
recentChanges: You can now tap on the current weather conditions for more details.
Moon phase terminologies like "waxing gibbous" and "waning crescent" don't make any sense to you? There's now an icon that illustrates each moon phase!
Introducing MeteoCard, a notification card on your watch that summarizes today's weather, as well as the week ahead!
